balance as at 30 September 2022 CNY51.0K of utilities paid on behalf of Company ABC, Company JKL, and Company MNO
As indicated by management, the Target accrued 2.0% bad debt provision for utilities receivables aged within 1 year.

SUMMARY: Used entities 'Company ABC' (CNY13.0K), 'Company JKL' (CNY20.0K), and 'Company MNO' (CNY18.0K) with total receivables of CNY51.0K and provision of CNY1.0K (2.0% of total)
